Articles.Content:
A few weeks back I posted that I have played this game for a while and had yet to make it to the Mun and back.

As of yesterday at 113 hours of gameplay I officially made it to the Mun and back!

Yep, time flies while playing KSP.

Congrats on your first Mun landing!
Awesome! That's really great. You'll only continue to do greater and greater things from here!

I am approaching the same amount of hours and have yet to make it to the Mun... I keep restarting my space program every time it updates, so heres hoping Squad takes it easy for the next update.

However, I have already made it to the Mun twice in the .18.3 demo version. Jeb didn't make it back to the KSC for the second though, as his fully RCS lander did not have sufficient delta-v to get back to orbit.
